DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if the AirSonea device provides an objective assessment of breath sounds for the presence of wheeze in both medical and home environments.
DOC.criteria: Part I: Participants presenting to an Acute Care Setting with an exacerbation of asthma or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease symptoms Part II: Volunteer participants without asthma Part III: Participants with asthma For all parts of study Age: 18 years or older Participant has signed an Informed Consent after having the Study explained to them. Any medical finding by the physician that would exclude the patient from participating. < than 18 years of age
